entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • More information when provisioning goes wrong #27940
  • iOS: Rectangle that is invisible when page loads can never be made visible #27935
    Backlog
  • Selective Exception breakpoints do not work properly #27934
  • [SFI] Fix nuget.config #27927
    .NET 9 SR5
  • AccessViolationException in CarouselView on dynamic Shell navigation on Windows #27925
  • I9_Scroll by object for grouped data - The group name is always pined at the top after clicking 'Scroll to Proboscis Monkey' button #27922
    Backlog
  • OOP Background task not firing in MAUI app for Windows on .NET 8 and .NET 9 #27919

Closed

  • Preferences problems with DateTime #27903
  • [MAUI] .NET 9 GA BlazorWebView not rendering on ARM64 Windows Desktop #26003
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Enable Blazor device tests #27556
    .NET 10 Planning
  • ScrollView doesn't center its content. #11315
  • Can't Create Default Android Device #27910
  • Flyout RightToLeft is not working on Android #17057
    Backlog
  • How to switch .NET MAUI Flyout of Shell to the right with FlowDirection? #15221
    Backlog
  • Maui -9.0.40 error : Failed to AOT compile SkiaSharp.Views.iOS.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 139. #27867
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Flyout automatically closes when FlyoutPage.Detail is updated #26324
    .NET 10 Planning
  • FATAL EXCEPTION when navigating back MAUI 9.0.40 #27901
  • [net10.0] Enable warnings for CS9270 #27315
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Vscode MacOs publish IOS error Invalid Binary #27914
  • Using GridLength.Star in RowDefinition leads to wrong row height #26779
  • System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException: Could not find a part of the path migrating Xamarin App to MAUI #27626
  • Slider appears to loose two way binding once manually adjusted with the thumb #27442
  • CollectionView VerticalScrollBarVisibility的Always不起作用 #27755
  • [Bug] iOS: On-Demand Resource Tag not available to be set #27213
  • Unable to use custom appicon always defaults to android appicon #27625
  • Using Maui.Controls.Maps crashes application #27219
  • Newly created maui app has errors #27756

PullRequests

Created

  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation
  • Bump appium #27939
  • [android] move `IsDispatchRequiredImplementation()` to Java #27936
  • [iOS][Shell][More Tab] Navigation from the 'More' tab - improvements #27932
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Testcase for Shell FlowDirection issue #27931
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Nullable TimePicker (make Time nullable) #27930
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Testing] Empowering UITests with AI #27929
    do-not-merge, area-testing
  • [Testing] Publish new snapshots and diffs to a specific artifacts folder #27928
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview1] Update sdk and aspnet versions #27926
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview1
  • Fix the FilePicker.PickMultipleAsync() Not Returning Null When Canceled #27924
    area-essentials, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Nullable DatePicker (make Date, MinimumDate & MaximumDate nullable) #27921
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-datetimepicker

Merged

  • Update Appium Versions #27933
    area-testing
  • Revert "Update Appium Versions" #27938
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #27918
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md with net10.0 #27913

Updated

  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Update gradle version for AndroidNative app from 7.6.1 to 8.10.2. #27859
    community ✨
  • Simplify test projects and fail faster #27517
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
    area-testing, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload - Handle fingerprint when hot reloading scoped CSS bundles #27788
    area-tooling
  • Fix CSS Hot Reload on iOS device #27812
    area-tooling
  • [BindingSG] Added Binding.Create support for xaml generated sources #27610
    area-xaml
  • [net10] Update aspnet as sdk, enable Blazor tests #27796
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20250219211456120 to main #27915
    area-localization
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR5
  • remove Dispose call on ShellItemRenderer #27890
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Set `UseRidGraph=false` on Windows (attempt 2) #27679
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS][Shell][More Tab] The 'More' tab - nav bar customization #27848
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
  • [iOS][Shell][More Tab] Tabbar icon color wrong on IOS (extended tabbar) - proposal #27825
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 11 #27764
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 1 #27695
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 10 #27751
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix flaky tests 6 #27874
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • Fix: Support Clickable Hyperlinks in Labels with TextType HTML (iOS & Android) #27907
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 14 #27906
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-general, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fixed ImageButton not honoring Padding value. #26785
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for WebView Fails to Load URLs with Certain Encoded Characters #27003
    community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 9 #27743
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 13 #27904
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for TabBar Navigation does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 3 #27905
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] - Handle Dynamic Updates for CanDrag and AllowDrop in Drag and Drop Gesture #27845
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows/Android] Fix Dynamic ShellContent Title Updates at Runtime #27609
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 2 #27500
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail. #27453
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 4 #27561
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed Shadow not updated when Clipping a View with a shadow #27873
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 12 #27804
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
